name: Chibi 3D Online RPG Sandbox
summary:
Welcome to the Chibi World Simulation! Build your own CHIBI World and meet and make Chibi friends all over the world.

Pick up your favorite Chibi Uniform and Cosplay as a Schoolgirl Chibi girl or school boy. You can either choose to play Adventure Mode where you can kill Monsters or you can play Role-Playing Mode where you can role play with your friends or alone. You can choose from a huge amount of user created Maps like High School Maps, Yandere Maps, Shopping Malls, Cafes, Bars, Parkour Maps and literally anything that you can imagine.
